dc:title: Prediabetes and Type 2 Diabetes: Screening
dc:description:
Adults aged 35 to 70 years who have overweight or obesity:
 The USPSTF recommends screening for prediabetes and type 2 diabetes.  Clinicians should offer or refer patients with prediabetes to effective preventive interventions.
Grade: B

schema:creator.schema:affiliation: Knowledge Systems Lab, University of Michigan Medical School

koio:hasTest.dc:title: Knowledge test
koio:hasTest.dc:description: These tests are written to test the accuracy of the knowledge implementation.

koio:hasTest.dc:title: Implementation tests
koio:hasTest.dc:description: These tests are written to test the use of superclass KO to implement this knowledge object.

koio:hasDocumentation.dc:title: Prediabetes and Type 2 Diabetes: Screening
koio:hasDocumentation.dc:description: This is the USPSTF documentation webpage for Prediabetes and Type 2 Diabetes Screening recommendation.

koio:hasDocumentation.dc:title: Using the Diabetes Screening in Adults Knowledge Object: A Step-by-Step Tutorial
koio:hasDocumentation.dc:description:
This Google Colab tutorial demonstrates four different ways to use the diabetes-screening knowledge object:
  • using the built-in command-line interface (CLI) service
  • using the python activator
  • using the knowledge object's knowledge representation directly in the code
